title: [Large-scale] Collaborative Design Workshop for Integrating Health Education and Nature

context.prior_knowledge: Basic health education knowledge and introductory understanding of the Victorian Curriculum (VC:HPE)
context.additional_context: Prospective teachers have limited prior experience linking health education with nature, requiring consideration of safety-risk balance.

learning_goals: Design specific lesson plans integrating health education activities with natural environments
Derive at least three educational intersections between health education and nature through collaborative work
Develop logical explanations balancing safety management and learning effectiveness when designing nature-based activities
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
